title: Forty-Five Seconds: A Chapbook
description: Joschua Beres presents intimate portraits of lived experience in the form of poetry as well contemplative speculations from the margins on humanity and its future impact. His poems function as vivid snapshots that guide the reader without completely elucidating the situation and touch on such varied themes as love, war, society, domestic violence, the colonization of the Moon and loss.
author: Joschua Beres
